description: Dr Catalin Denciu tried to save Covid-19 patients from a fire in a hospital intensive care unit.
title: Covid: Romania's 'hero' doctor taken to Belgium for treatment for severe burns
title_page: Covid: Romania's 'hero' doctor taken to Belgium for treatment for severe burns - BBC News
maintext: Seven men and three women, aged between 67 and 86, died in the fire. Six other Covid-19 patients injured in the fire were transferred to another hospital in the city of Iasi.
